GSP29nysu51pu:0: NySBh_5,1.0 sādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ pratyavasthānasya vikalpāj jātibahutvam iti saṃkṣepeṇoktaṃ,
GSP29nysu51pu:1: tad vistareṇa vibhajyate tāḥ khalv imā jātayaḥ sthāpanāhetau prayukte caturviṃśatiḥ pratiṣedhahetavaḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:3: NySBh_5,1.1 jāteḥ saṃkṣepeṇoktāyā vistaro vaktavya itīdānīm ārabhyate sādharmyādisūtram
GSP29nysu51pu:9: NySBh_5,1.2 sādharmyeṇopasaṃhāre sādhyadharmaviparyayopapatteḥ sādharmyeṇaiva pratyavasthānam aviśiṣyamāṇaṃ sthāpanāhetutaḥ sādharmyasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GSP29nysu51pu:11: dravyaṃ loṣṭaḥ kriyāhetuguṇayuktaḥ kriyāvāṃs tathā cātmā tasmāt kriyāvān iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:12: evam upasaṃhṛte paraḥ sādharmyeṇaiva pratyavatiṣṭhate niṣkriya ātmā vibhuno dravyasya niṣkriyatvād vibhu cākāśaṃ niṣkriyaṃ ca tathā cātmā tasmān niṣkriya iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:13: na cāsti viśeṣahetuḥ kriyāvatsādharmyāt kriyāvatā bhavitavyaṃ na punar akriyasādharmyād niṣkriyeṇeti /
GSP29nysu51pu:15: atha vaidharmyasamaḥ kriyāhetuguṇayukto loṣṭaḥ paricchinno dṛṣṭo na ca tathātmā tasmān na loṣṭavat kriyāvān iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:16: na cāsti viśeṣahetuḥ kriyāvatsādharmyāt kriyāvatā bhavitavyaṃ na punaḥ kriyāvadvaidharmyād akriyeṇeti viśeṣahetvabhāvād vaidharmyasamaḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:17: vaidharmyeṇa copasaṃhāraḥ niṣkriya ātmā vibhutvāt kriyāvad dravyam avibhu dṛṣṭaṃ niṣkriyaṃ loṣṭaḥ na ca tathātmā tasmān niṣkriya iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:18: vaidharmyeṇa pratyavasthānaṃ niṣkriyaṃ dravyam ākāśaṃ kriyāhetuguṇarahitaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ na ca tathātmā tasmān na niṣkriya iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:19: na cāsti viśeṣahetuḥ kriyāvadvaidharmyān niṣkriyeṇa bhavitavyaṃ na punar akriyavaidharmyāt kriyāvateti viśeṣahetvabhāvād vaidharmyasamaḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:20: atha sādharmyasamaḥ kriyāvāṃl loṣṭaḥ kriyāhetuguṇayukto dṛṣṭaḥ tathā cātmā tasmāt
GSP29nysu51pu:21: kriyāvān iti na cāsti viśeṣahetuḥ kriyāvadvaidharmyān niṣkriyo na punaḥ kriyāvatsādharmyāt
GSP29nysu51pu:24: NySBh_5,1.3 sādharmyamātreṇa vaidharmyamātreṇa ca sādhyasādhane pratijñāyamāne syād
GSP29nysu51pu:25: avyavasthā sā tu dharmaviśeṣe nopapadyate gosādharmyād gotvāj jātiviśeṣād gauḥ sidhyati
GSP29nysu51pu:27: aśvādivaidharmyād gotvād eva gauḥ sidhyati na guṇādibhedāt /
GSP29nysu51pu:28: tac caitat kṛtavyākhyānam avayavaprakaraṇe pramāṇānām abhisambandhāc caikārthakāritvaṃ samānaṃ vākye iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:32: yadi kriyāhetuguṇayogāl loṣṭavat kriyāvān ātmā loṣṭavad eva sparśavān api prāpnoti /
GSP29nysu51pu:33: atha na sparśavāṃl loṣṭavat kriyāvān api na prāpnoti viparyaye vā viśeṣo vaktavya iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:35: loṣṭaḥ khalu kriyāvān avibhur dṛṣṭaḥ kāmam ātmāpi kriyāvān avibhur astu viparyaye vā viśeṣo vaktavya iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:36: khyāpanīyo varṇyo viparyayād avarṇyaḥ tāv etau sādhyadṛṣṭāntadharmau viparyasyato varṇyāvarṇyasamau bhavataḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:37: sādhanadharmayukte dṛṣṭānte dharmāntaravikalpāt sādhyadharmavikalpaṃ prasañjayato vikalpasamaḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:38: kriyāhetuguṇayuktaṃ kiṃcid guru yathā loṣṭaḥ kiṃcil laghu yathā vāyuḥ evaṃ kriyāhetuguṇayuktaṃ kiṃcit kriyāvat syād yathā loṣṭaḥ kiṃcid akriyaṃ yathātmā viśeṣo vā vācya iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:39: hetvādyavayavasāmarthyayogī dharmaḥ sādhyaḥ taṃ dṛṣṭānte prasañjayataḥ sādhyasamaḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:40: yadi yathā loṣṭas tathātmā prāptas tarhi yathātmā tathā loṣṭa iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:41: sādhyaś cāyam ātmā kriyāvān iti kāmaṃ loṣṭo 'pi sādhyaḥ atha naivaṃ na tarhi yathā loṣṭaḥ tathātmā //
GSP29nysu51pu:45: siddhaṃ ca kiṃcitsādhatmyād upamānaṃ yathā gaus tathā gavaya iti tatra na labhyo gogavayayor dharmavikalpaś codayitum /
GSP29nysu51pu:46: evaṃ sādhake dharme dṛṣṭāntādisāmarthyayukte na labhyaḥ sādhyadṛṣṭāntayor dharmavikalpād vaidharmyāt pratiṣedho vaktum iti //
GSP29nysu51pu:48: NySBh_5,1.6 yatra laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ buddhisāmyaṃ tenāviparīto 'rtho 'tidiśyate prajñāpanārtham /
GSP29nysu51pu:49: evaṃ sādhyātideśād dṛṣṭānte upapadyamāne sādhyatvam anupapannam iti //
GSP29nysu51pu:50: NyS_5,1.7 prāpya sādhyam aprāpya vā hetoḥ prāptyāviśiṣṭatvād aprāptyāsādhakatvāc ca prāptyaprāptisamau //
GSP29nysu51pu:51: NySBh_5,1.7 hetuḥ prāpya vā sādhyaṃ sādhayed aprāpya vā ?
GSP29nysu51pu:52: na tāvat prāpya prāptyām aviśiṣṭatvād asādhakaḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:53: dvayor vidyamānayoḥ prāptau satyāṃ kiṃ kasya sādhakaṃ sādhyaṃ vā ?
GSP29nysu51pu:54: aprāpya sādhakaṃ na bhavati nāprāptaḥ pradīpaḥ prakāśayatīti /
GSP29nysu51pu:55: prāptyā pratyavasthānaṃ prāptisamaḥ aprāptyā pratyavasthānam aprāptisamaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:58: NySBh_5,1.8 ubhayathā khalv ayuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ kartṛkaraṇādhikaraṇāni prāpya mṛdaṃ ghaṭādikāryaṃ niṣpādayanti abhicārāc ca pīḍane sati dṛṣṭam aprāpya sādhakatvam iti //
GSP29nysu51pu:59: NyS_5,1.9 dṛṣṭāntasya kāraṇānapadeśāt pratyavasthānāc ca pratidṛṣṭāntena prasaṅgapratidṛṣṭāntasamau//
GSP29nysu51pu:60: NySBh_5,1.9 sādhanasyāpi sādhanaṃ vaktavyam iti prasaṅgena pratyavasthānaṃ prasaṅgasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:61: kriyāhetuguṇayogī kriyāvāṃl loṣṭa iti hetur nāpadiśyate na ca hetum antereṇa siddhir astīti /
GSP29nysu51pu:63: kriyāvān ātmā kriyāhetuguṇayogād loṣṭavad ity ukte pratidṛṣṭānta upādīyate kriyāhetuguṇayuktam ākāśaṃ niṣkriyaṃ dṛṣṭam iti kaḥ punar ākāśasya kriyāhetuguṇaḥ ?
GSP29nysu51pu:67: NySBh_5,1.10 idaṃ tāvad ayaṃ pṛṣṭo vaktum arhati atha ke pradīpam upādadate kimarthaṃ veti ?
GSP29nysu51pu:69: atha pradīpaṃ didṛkṣamāṇāḥ pradīpāntaraṃ kasmān nopādadate ?
GSP29nysu51pu:70: antareṇāpi pradīpāntataṃ dṛśyate pradīpaḥ tatra pradīpadarśanārthaṃ pradīpopādānaṃ nirarthakam /
GSP29nysu51pu:71: atha dṛṣṭāntaḥ kimartham ucyata iti aprajñātasya jñāpanārtham iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:74: sa khalu “laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ yasminn arthe buddhisāmyaṃ sa dṛṣṭānta” iti tatprajñāpanārthaḥ kāraṇāpadeśo nirarthaka iti prasaṅgasamasyottaram
GSP29nysu51pu:77: NySBh_5,1.11 pratidṛṣṭāntaṃ bruvatā na viśeṣahetur apadiśyate anena prakāreṇa pratidṛṣṭānataḥ sādhako na dṛṣṭānta iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:78: evaṃ pratidṛṣṭāntahetutve nāhetur dṛṣṭānta ity upapadyate /
GSP29nysu51pu:79: sa ca kathaṃ hetur na syāt ?
GSP29nysu51pu:82: NySBh_5,1.12 anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavad ity ukte apara āha prāg utpatter anutpanne śabde prayatnānantarīyakatvam anityatvakāraṇaṃ
GSP29nysu51pu:87: NyS_5,1.13 tathābhāvād utpannasya kāraṇopapatter na kāraṇapratiṣedhaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:89: utpannaḥ khalv ayaṃ śabda iti bhavati /
GSP29nysu51pu:91: utpannasya śabdabhāvāc chabdasya sataḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvam anityatvakāraṇam upapadyate,
GSP29nysu51pu:92: kāraṇopapatter ayukto 'yaṃ doṣaḥ “prāg utpatteḥ kāraṇābhāvād” iti //
GSP29nysu51pu:93: NyS_5,1.14 sāmānya+dṛṣṭāntayor aindriyakatve samāne nityānityasādharmyāt saṃśayasamaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:94: NySBh_5,1.14 anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavad ity ukte hetau saṃśayena
GSP29nysu51pu:95: pratyavatiṣṭate sati prayatnānantarīyakatve asty evāsya nityena sāmānyena sādharmyam aindriyakatvam,
GSP29nysu51pu:99: NyS_5,1.15 sādharmyāt saṃśaye na saṃśayo vaidharmyād ubhayathā vā saṃśaye 'tyantasaṃśayaprasaṅgo nityatvānabhyupagamāc ca sāmānysyāpratiṣedhaḥ
GSP29nysu51pu:100: NySBh_5,1.15 viśeṣād vaidharmyād avadhāryamāṇe 'rthe puruṣa iti,
GSP29nysu51pu:102: evaṃ vaidharmyād viśeṣāt prayatnānantarīyakatvād avadhāryamāṇe śabdasyānityatve nityānityasādharmyāt saṃśayo 'vakāśaṃ na labhate /
GSP29nysu51pu:105: gṛhyamāṇe ca viśeṣe nityaṃ sādharmyaṃ saṃśayahetur iti nābhyupagamyate /
GSP29nysu51pu:106: na hi gṛhyamāṇe puruṣasya viśeṣe sthāṇupuruṣasādharmyaṃ saṃśayahetur bhavati //
GSP29nysu51pu:108: NySBh_5,1.16 ubhayena nityena cānityena ca sādharmyāt pakṣapratipakṣayoḥ pravṛttiḥ prakriyā /
GSP29nysu51pu:109: anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavad ity ekaḥ pakṣaṃ pravarttayati,
GSP29nysu51pu:110: dvitīyaś ca nityasādharmyāt pratipakṣaṃ pravarttayati nityaḥ śabdaḥ śrāvaṇatvāc chabdatvavad iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:111: evaṃ ca sati prayatnānantarīyakatvād iti hetur anityasādharmyeṇa ucyamāno na prakaraṇam ativarttate ,
GSP29nysu51pu:118: NySBh_5,1.17 ubhayasādharmyāt prakriyāsiddhaṃ bruvatā pratipakṣāt prakriyāsiddhir uktā bhavati /
GSP29nysu51pu:120: tatra ekataraḥ pratipakṣa ity evaṃ saty upapannaḥ pratipakṣo bhavati /
GSP29nysu51pu:129: tat sādhyāt pūrvaṃ paścāt saha vā bhavet /
GSP29nysu51pu:135: dvayor vidyamānayoḥ kiṃ kasya sādhanaṃ kiṃ kasya sādhyam iti hetur ahetunā na viśiṣyate /
GSP29nysu51pu:140: nirvartanīyasya nirvṛttir vijñeyasya vijñānam ubhayaṃ kāraṇato dṛśyate,
GSP29nysu51pu:142: yat tu khalūktam asati sādhye kasya sādhanam iti ?
GSP29nysu51pu:143: yat tu nirvatyate yac ca vijñāpyate tasyeti //
GSP29nysu51pu:145: NySBh_5,1.20 pūrvaṃ paścād yugapad vā pratiṣedha iti nopapadyate,
GSP29nysu51pu:148: NySBh_5,1.21 anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavad iti sthāpite pakṣe arthāpattyā pratipakṣaṃ sādhayato 'rthāpattisamaḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:149: yadi prayatnānantarīyakatvād anityasādharmyād anityaḥ śabda iti,
GSP29nysu51pu:151: asti cāsya nityena sādharmyam asparśatvam iti //
GSP29nysu51pu:153: NyS_5,1.22 anuktasyārthāpatteḥ pakṣahāner upapattir anuktatvād anaikānatikatvāc cārthāpatteḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:154: NySBh_5,1.22 anupapādya sāmarthyam anuktam arthād āpadyate iti bruvataḥ pakṣahāner upapattir anuktatvāt,
GSP29nysu51pu:155: anityapakṣasiddhāv arthād āpannaṃ nityapakṣasya hānir iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:158: yadi nityasādharmyād asparśatvād ākāśavac ca nityaḥ śabdaḥ,
GSP29nysu51pu:162: na khalu vai ghaṇasya grāvṇaḥ patanam ity arthād āpadyate dravāṇām apāṃ patanābhāva iti //
GSP29nysu51pu:163: NyS_5,1.23 ekadharmopapatter aviśeṣe sarvāviśeṣaprasaṅgāt sadbhāvopapatter aviśeṣasamaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:164: NySBh_5,1.23 eko dharmaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ śabdaghaṭayor upapadyata ity aviśeṣe ubhayor anityatve,
GSP29nysu51pu:169: NyS_5,1.24 kvacit taddharmopapatteḥ kvacic cānupapatteḥ pratiṣedhābhāvaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:170: NySBh_5,1.24 yathā sādhyadṛṣṭāntayor ekadharmasya prayatnānantarīyakatvasyopapatter anityatvaṃ dharmāntaram aviśeṣaḥ,
GSP29nysu51pu:173: atha matam anityatvam eva dharmānataraṃ sadbhāvopapattinimittaṃ bhāvānāṃ sarvatra syād iti,
GSP29nysu51pu:174: evaṃ khalu vai kalpyamāne anityāḥ sarve bhāvāḥ sadbhāvopapatter iti pakṣaḥ prāpnoti /
GSP29nysu51pu:180: tasmāt sadbhāvopapatteḥ sarvāviśeṣaprasaṅga iti nirabhidheyam etad vākyam iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:181: sarvabhāvānāṃ sadbhāvopapatter anityatvam iti bruvatānujñātaṃ śabdasyānityatvaṃ,
GSP29nysu51pu:184: NySBh_5,1.25 yady anityatvakāraṇam upapadyate śabdasyety anityaḥ śabdo nityatvakāraṇam apy upapadyate 'syāsparśatvam iti nityatvam apy upapadyate
GSP29nysu51pu:185: ubhayasyānityatvasya nityatvasya ca kāraṇopapattyā pratyavasthānam upapattisamaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:187: NySBh_5,1.26 ubhayakāraṇopapatter iti bruvatā nānityatvakāraṇopapatter anityatvaṃ pratiṣidhyate,
GSP29nysu51pu:193: ekasya nityatvānityatvaprasaṅgaṃ vyāhataṃ bruvatoktaṃ pratiṣedha iti cet ?
GSP29nysu51pu:197: NySBh_5,1.27 nirdiṣṭasya prayatnānantarīyakatvasyānityatvakāraṇasyābhāve 'pi vāyunodanād vṛkṣaśākhābhaṅgajasya śabdasyānityatvam upalabhyate
GSP29nysu51pu:201: NySBh_5,1.28 prayatnānantarīyakatvād iti bruvatā kāraṇata utpattir abhidhīyate,
GSP29nysu51pu:203: yadi ca kāraṇāntarād apy utpadyamānasya śabdasya tad anityatvam upapadyate,
GSP29nysu51pu:205: na prāg uccāraṇād vidyamānasya śabdasyānupalabdhiḥ, kasmāt ?
GSP29nysu51pu:208: gṛhyeta caitad asyāgrahaṇakāraṇam udakādivat, na gṛhyate /
GSP29nysu51pu:210: NyS_5,1.29 tadanupalabdher anupalambhād abhāvasiddhau tadviparītopapatter anupalabdhisamaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:213: abhāvasiddhau hetvabhāvāt tadviparītam astitvam āvaraṇādīnām avadhāryate /
GSP29nysu51pu:214: tadviparītopapatter yatpratijñātaṃ “na prāg uccāraṇād vidyamānasya śabdasyānupalabdhir ity” etan na sidhyati /
GSP29nysu51pu:215: so 'yaṃ “hetur āvaraṇādyanupalabdher” ity āvaraṇādiṣu cāvaraṇādyanupalabdhau ca samayānupalabdhyā pratyavasthito 'nupalabdhisamo bhavati //
GSP29nysu51pu:226: so 'yam āvaraṇādyanupalabheḥ anupalambha upalabdhyabhāve 'nupalabdhau svaviṣaye pravarttamāno na svaviṣayaṃ pratiṣedhati /
GSP29nysu51pu:231: tadupalabdheḥ svaviṣayapratipādikāyā abhāvād anupalambhād anupalabdher viṣayo gamyate na santy āvaraṇādīni śabdasyāgrahaṇakāraṇānīti /
GSP29nysu51pu:237: asti me saṃśayajñānaṃ nāsti me saṃśayajñānam iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:239: seyam āvaraṇādyanupalabdhir upalabdhyabhāvaḥ svasaṃvedyaḥ nāsti me śabdasyāvaraṇādyupalabdhir iti nopalabdhyante śabdasyāgrahaṇakāraṇāny āvaraṇādīnīti
GSP29nysu51pu:240: tatra yad uktaṃ tadanupalabdher anupalambhād abhāvasiddhir iti,
GSP29nysu51pu:244: 5,1.32 anityena ghaṭena sādharmyād anityaḥ śabda iti bruvato 'sti ghaṭenānityena sarvabhāvānāṃ sādharmyam iti sarvasyānityatvam aniṣṭaṃ sampadyate
GSP29nysu51pu:245: so 'yam anityatvena pratyavasthānād anityasama iti // NySBh_
GSP29nysu51pu:248: NySBh_5,1.33 pratijñādyavayavayuktaṃ vākyaṃ pakṣanivartakaṃ pratipakṣalakṣaṇaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:253: NyS_5,1.34 dṛṣṭānte ca sādhyasādhanabhāvena prajñātasya dharmasya hetutvāt tasya cobhayathābhāvān nāviśeṣaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:254: NySBh_5,1.34 dṛṣṭānte yaḥ khalu dharmaḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvena prajñāyate,
GSP29nysu51pu:261: sādharmyamātraṃ vaidharmyamātraṃ cāśritya bhavān āha “sādharmyāt tulyadharmopapatteḥ sarvānityatvaprasaṅgād anityasama” iti,
GSP29nysu51pu:263: aviśeṣasamapratiṣedhe ca yad uktaṃ tad api veditavyam //
GSP29nysu51pu:264: NyS_5,1.35 nityam anityabhāvād anitye nityatvopapatter nityasamaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:266: tad anityatvaṃ kiṃ śabde nityam athānityam ?
GSP29nysu51pu:268: dharmasya sadā bhāvād dharmiṇo 'pi sadā bhāva iti nityaḥ śabda iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:273: NyS_5,1.36 pratiṣedhye nityam anityabhāvād anitye 'nityatvopapatteḥ pratiṣedhābhāvaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:274: NySBh_5,1.36 pratiṣedhye śabde nityam anityatvasya bhāvād ity ucyamāne 'nujñātaṃ śabdasyānityatvam,
GSP29nysu51pu:275: anityatvopapatteś ca “nānityaḥ śabda” iti pratiṣedho nopapadyate /
GSP29nysu51pu:277: nityam anityatvasya bhāvād iti hetur na bhavatīti hetvabhāvāt pratiṣedhānupapattir iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:280: yo 'yaṃ paripaśnaḥ tad anityatvaṃ kiṃ śabde sarvadā bhavati atha neti,
GSP29nysu51pu:282: kasmāt ? utpannasya yo nirodhād abhāvaḥ śabdasya tad anityatvam ;
GSP29nysu51pu:283: evaṃ ca saty adhikaraṇādheyavibhāgo vyāghātān nāstīti /
GSP29nysu51pu:285: nityatvam anityatvaṃ ca ekasya dharmiṇo dharmāv iti virudhyete,
GSP29nysu51pu:287: tatra yad uktaṃ nityam anityatvasya bhāvān nitya eva,
GSP29nysu51pu:291: yasya prayatnānantaram ātmalābhaḥ tat khalv abhūtvā bhavati,
GSP29nysu51pu:293: anityam iti ca bhūtvā na bhavatīty etad vijñāyate /
GSP29nysu51pu:294: evam avasthite prayatnakāryānekatvād iti pratiṣedha ucyate /
GSP29nysu51pu:297: tat kiṃ prayatnānantaram ātmalābhaḥ śabdasyāho 'bhivyaktir iti viśeṣo nāsti /
GSP29nysu51pu:301: NySBh_5,1.38 sati kāryānyatve anupalabdhikāraṇopapatteḥ prayatnasyāhetutvaṃ śabdasyābhivyaktau /
GSP29nysu51pu:302: yatra prayatnānantaram abhivyaktis tatrānupalabdhikāraṇaṃ vyavadhānam upapadyate,
GSP29nysu51pu:307: hetoś ced anaikāntikatvam upapadyate anaikātikatvād asādhakaḥ syād iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:311: kiṃcit pratiṣedhati kiṃcin neti anaikāntikatvād asādhaka iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:312: atha vā śabdasyānityatvapakṣe prayatnānantaram utpādo nābhivyaktir iti viśeṣahetvabhāvaḥ,
GSP29nysu51pu:313: nityatvapakṣe 'pi prayatnānantaram abhivyaktir notpāda iti viśeṣahetvabhāvaḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:314: so 'yam ubhayapakṣasamo viśeṣahetvabhāva ity ubhayam apy anaikātikam iti //
GSP29nysu51pu:316: NySBh_5,1.40 sarveṣu sādharmyaprabhṛtiṣu pratiṣedhahetuṣu yatra yatrāviśeṣo dṛśyate tatrobhayoḥ pakṣayoḥ samaḥ prasajyata iti //
GSP29nysu51pu:318: NySBh_5,1.41 yo 'yaṃ pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣo 'naikāntikatvam āpadyate so 'yaṃ pratiṣedhasya vipratiṣedhe 'pi samānaḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:319: tatrānityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād iti sādhanavādinaḥ sthāpanā prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:320: “prayatnakāryānekatvāt kāryasama” iti dūṣaṇavādinaḥ pratiṣedhahetunā dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:322: tasyāsya pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa iti tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ vipratiṣedha ucyate /
GSP29nysu51pu:323: tasmin pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣo 'naikāntikatvaṃ caturthaḥ pakṣaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:324: NyS_5,1.42 pratiṣedhaṃ sadoṣam abhyupetya pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe samāno doṣaprasaṅgo matānujñā //
GSP29nysu51pu:325: NySBh_5,1.42 pratiṣedhaṃ dvitīyaṃ pakṣaṃ sadoṣam abhyupetya taduddhāram akṛtvānujñāya
GSP29nysu51pu:326: pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe tṛtīyapakṣe samānam anaikāntikatvam iti samānaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ prasañjayato
GSP29nysu51pu:327: dūṣaṇavādino matānujñā prasajyata iti pañcamaḥ pakṣaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:328: NyS_5,1.43 svapakṣalakṣaṇāpekṣopapattyupasaṃhāre hetunirdeśe parapakṣadoṣābhyupagamāt samāno doṣaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:329: NySBh_5,1.43 sthāpanāpakṣe prayatnakāryānekatvād iti doṣaḥ sthāpanāhetuvādinaḥ svapakṣalakṣaṇo bhavati /
GSP29nysu51pu:331: so 'yaṃ svapakṣalakṣaṇaṃ doṣam apekṣamāṇo 'nuddhṛtyānujñāya pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa ity upapadyamānaṃ doṣaṃ parapakṣe upasaṃharati /
GSP29nysu51pu:332: itthaṃ cānaikāntikaḥ pratiṣedha iti hetuṃ nirdiśati /
GSP29nysu51pu:333: tatra svapakṣalakṣaṇāpekṣayopapadyamānadoṣopasaṃhāre hetunirdeśe ca saty anena parapakṣadoṣo 'bhyupagato bhavati /
GSP29nysu51pu:336: tam anuddhṛtya pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa ity āha /
GSP29nysu51pu:337: evaṃ sthāpanāṃ sadoṣām abhyupetya pratiṣedhe 'pi samānaṃ doṣaṃ prasañjayataḥ parapakṣābhyupagamāt samāno doṣo bhavati /
GSP29nysu51pu:338: yathā parasya pratiṣedhaṃ sadoṣam abhyupetya pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣaprasaṅgo matānujñā prasajyata iti,
GSP29nysu51pu:339: tathāsyāpi sthāpanāṃ sadoṣām abhyupetya pratiṣedhe 'pi samānaṃ doṣaṃ prasañjayato matānujñā prasajyata iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:342: pratiṣedhahetuvādinaḥ dvitīyacaturthaṣaṣṭapakṣāḥ teṣāṃ sādhvasādhutāyāṃ mīmāṃsyamānāyāṃ caturthaṣaṣṭayor arthāviśeṣāt punaruktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ
GSP29nysu51pu:343: caturthapakṣe samānadoṣatvaṃ parasyocyate “pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe pratiṣedhadoṣavad doṣa” iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:344: ṣaṣṭe 'pi “parapakṣadoṣābhyupagamāt samāno doṣa” iti samānadoṣatvam evocyate,
GSP29nysu51pu:347: tṛṭīyapakṣe 'pi “pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa” iti samānatvam abhyupagamyate /
GSP29nysu51pu:352: prathamadvitīyayor viśeṣahetvabhāva iti ṣaṭpakṣyām ubhayor asiddhiḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:354: yadā “pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa” ity evaṃ pravarttate /
GSP29nysu51pu:356: yadā tu “kāryānyatve prayatnāhetutvam anupalabdhikāraṇopapatter” ity anena tṛṭīyapakṣo yajyate,
GSP29nysu51pu:358: nābhivyaktir” iti siddhaḥ prathamapakṣo na ṣaṭpakṣī pravartata iti //
